I sincerely congratulate all the people of Azerbaijan on the Republic Day, and wish each of you good health and happiness.
Five decades ago, for the first time in the Muslim world, a democratic republic was formed in Azerbaijan. It was a great and historic event.
Because the people of Azerbaijan had gained independence and freedom for centuries. The Azerbaijani people already had their own state.
At the same time, the establishment of the republic has given impetus to the spread of the republican structure in the Muslim world.
Democratic development was going on, women were given the right to vote, the National Army was established.
In short, the founders of the republic had done a lot, and the people of Azerbaijan respected their memory.
Over the last decade, the people and state of Azerbaijan have experienced a rapid development in the true sense of the word.
All foreign policy tasks have been implemented. Very good contacts have been established in the bilateral format.
The role of Azerbaijan in the region has been greatly strengthened and Azerbaijan has an active role in all processes in the region.
Azerbaijan's initiatives are of great importance for regional cooperation.
@EU_Commission discussing democracy and the rule of law w/ world’s regional leaders #demdialog13
No project, no initiative can be successful without Azerbaijan's participation.
Internal processes, I think, have greatly strengthened our country over the past decade.
Internal stability, public-political order, unity between people and power - all these factors are essential for the successful development of each country
If stability was not maintained, if stability was deteriorated, of course, no foreign investment in Azerbaijan would be.
In recent years, Azerbaijan has achieved great success both in political and economic spheres.
We have been the fastest growing country in the world over the past decade.
I think we should ensure the fastest development of the non-oil sector over the next decade.
All our projects have been successfully implemented - Baku-Tbilisi-Ceyhan, Baku-Tbilisi-Erzurum and other projects.
The signing of the TANAP project last year is a great historical event. I can say with pride that the initiator of this project is Azerbaijan.
Talking with @AUJS about the Government’s commitment to preserving hate speech laws. TeamJG http://t.co/CVlDFLAiKq
The PM discussed signing the London Declaration on Anti-Semitism with @AUJS. TeamJG http://t.co/Rz8EuV2dgA
The biggest financial and technical burden falls on Azerbaijan. We are ready for this responsibility.
#Democracy is challenged every day and needs to be reconquered by each generation #demdialog13
The initiatives put forward and implemented by Azerbaijan in the current period draw attention. Our decisions are expected.
The decisions that will be made in Azerbaijan will contribute to the energy security of the continent.
Together with our partners, we identify the new energy map of the continent. This is a great responsibility, a great honor, a great achievement.
Today, the energy diversification initiatives of the region are largely based on Azerbaijan's initiatives.
The first years of our independence were hard and difficult. The years 1991-1993 were the most difficult years.
The Azerbaijani people deserve even better conditions, and this condition has been ensured by the policy of our great leader Heydar Aliyev.
Independence is the greatest happiness and the greatest wealth. We protect and defend our independence.
